character_creation.title: Kid Trait Distribution (4-3-2 Rule)
character_creation.content: Kid characters must assign exactly 4, 3, and 2 to their Body, Mind, and Spirit traits. This ensures balanced characters with clear strengths and weaknesses.

character_creation.title: Animon Stat Point Distribution
character_creation.content: Basic stage Animon get 8 points to distribute among Power, Heart, Brains, and Agility (max 4 per stat). Fledgling stage gets 4 points (max 3 per stat).
examples: Basic: 8 points total, max 4 per stat
Fledgling: 4 points total, max 3 per stat

character_creation.title: Derived Stat Calculation Formulas
character_creation.content: HP = Heart × 3, Damage = Power + 1, Dodge = Agility + 10, Initiative = Agility. These formulas apply to all Animon evolution stages.

combat.title: Initiative and Turn Order
combat.content: Combat proceeds in initiative order, determined by each participant's Initiative stat (equal to Agility for Animon). Higher initiative acts first.

combat.title: Elemental Type Effectiveness
combat.content: Some elements are strong or weak against others. Fire beats Plant, Water beats Fire, Electric beats Water, Plant beats Earth, etc.
examples: Fire attacks deal extra damage to Plant types
Water attacks are super effective against Fire types
Electric attacks are strong against Water and Aerial types

combat.title: Signature Attack Usage
combat.content: Each Animon can have one Signature Attack with uses equal to their Brains stat. These are powerful special moves that can turn the tide of battle.
examples: Brains 3 = 3 uses of Signature Attack per battle
Signature Attacks often have special effects

evolution.title: Animon Evolution Stages
evolution.content: Animon evolve through five stages: Fledgling → Basic → Super → Ultra → Giga. Each stage unlocks new abilities and higher stat caps.
examples: Basic: 8 stat points, Signature Attack unlocked
Super: Higher stat caps, new abilities

evolution.title: Kid-Animon Bond System
evolution.content: The bond between Kid and Animon affects evolution and abilities. Higher bond levels unlock advanced evolution stages and special combo attacks.

gameplay.title: Kid Stamina and Exhaustion
gameplay.content: Kids start with 4 Stamina points. Stamina is spent on special actions and abilities. When Stamina reaches 0, the Kid becomes exhausted.
examples: Exhausted Kids have penalties to actions

gameplay.title: Virtue and Moral Choices
gameplay.content: Each Kid has a core Virtue that guides their moral compass. Acting in accordance with your Virtue can provide bonuses, while acting against it may cause penalties.
examples: Courage virtue: Bonuses when facing danger
Kindness virtue: Bonuses when helping others
Acting against virtue may cause internal conflict
